rat:FanOfKnives.NAME: Fan of Knives
rat:FanOfKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice. NL Draw 1 card.
rat:FanOfKnives.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies twitce. NL Draw 2 cards.

rat:ColdBlood.NAME: Cold Blood
rat:ColdBlood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Combo 3: Gain !M! Strength again.

rat:Shadowstep.NAME: Shadowstep
rat:Shadowstep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity until the end of the turn.

rat:MimicPod.NAME: Mimic Pod
rat:MimicPod.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. Gain !M! Strength for each Attack drawn, and gain !M! Dexterity for each Skill drawn.

rat:OpeningStrike.NAME: Opening Strike
rat:OpeningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal !D! damage twice. If this was the first card played this turn, deal !D! damage again. NL Exhaust.

rat:Disembowel.NAME: Disembowel
rat:Disembowel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Combo 2: Apply !M! Weak. Combo 3: Apply !M! Vulnerable. Combo 5: Deal !D! damage again. Combo 6: Add a copy of this card to your hand.

rat:Lunge.NAME: Lunge
rat:Lunge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Combo 2: Gain !B! Block next turn. Combo 3: Gain !M! Plated Armor. Combo 5: Gain !M! Metalicize. Combo 6: Gain !M! Dexterity.

rat:Sprint.NAME: Sprint
rat:Sprint.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Combo 2: Draw !M! more cards.
